abstract: Local media in Myanmar report that 47 government soldiers have been killed and more than 70 others wounded in battles between Myanmar troops and Kokang rebels near Chinese border.
lead_paragraph: Clashes between Myanmar troops and ethnic Kokang rebels near the Chinese border have left 47 government soldiers dead and 73 wounded, state news media said Friday.

headline.main: Myanmar: 47 Government Troops Killed by Rebels
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: 47 Government Troops Killed by Rebels

snippet: Clashes between Myanmar troops and ethnic Kokang rebels near the Chinese border have left 47 government soldiers dead and 73 wounded, state news media said Friday.
